longDesc:
Freyias Brightening Vitamin E Daily Face Wash helps
remove impurities from the skin without stripping of the
essential natural oils.
• Promotes even skin tone
• Non-drying formulation
Key ingredients:
- Calendula Extracts is a natural deep cleansing treatment that removes skin impurities.
- Niacinamide and vitamin E keeps the skin hydrated and moisturized.
-Made in India
-Not tested on animal
-Paraben free
-Recyclable packaging

how to use:
Wash the face/skin with water and towel dry.
Apply the facewash on your face/skin and keep rubbing it
gently in circular motions until lather is formed.
Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.
Always apply moisturizer on the skin after using
Freyias Daily Face Wash.

longDesc:
Diva’s Secret Intimate Brightening Solution is
a safe moisturizer based brightening product
which helps to lighten and fade dark spots,
discoloration, hyperpigmentation, uneven skin
tones etc. of intimate and other sensitive area.
Beside brightening it nourishes and moisturizes
the skin.
Our Products
Made in Bangladesh
• Healthy brightening solution
• Helps to gradually reduce dark spots
• Helps to balance skin tone
• Helps to keep skin hydrated
• Helps to nourish and moisturize the skin
• Suitable for all skin type
• Premium quality product
• No harmful chemical used
Uses area :
• Bikini area/ private parts
• Underarms
• Neck
• Knee
• Elbow
• Any other dark area of the body
How to use: 
1) Use in clean surface**
Wash the intimate part thoroughly and pat it dry.
2) Apply the cream to your skin.
Apply a thin layer of moisturizer based solution and massage gently into the desired area till it is absorbed.
3) Allow it to work overnight.
Let the brightening agents work their magic overnight on your skin and make it bright and moisturized.
name: Divas Secret Intimate Brightening Solution 50 ml
nameWithoutSubText: Divas Secret Intimate Brightening Solution

Nature’s goodness for a natural glow
Himalaya’s Natural Glow Fairness Cream is an advanced skin lightening formula.

Ingredients: 
Alfalfa: Alfalfa is a source of Vitamins A, K and D, polyphenols, and flavonoids. It is also high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, potassium, and essential enzymes.

Kesar: Saffron (Kesar) is a luxurious herb that has been used in skincare for centuries for a fairer, brighter complexion. Saffron known to keeps the skin moisturized and smooth.

Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya drugs Ltd.

Nourishes hair Keeps hair healthy
A natural hair cream full of goodness, Himalaya’s Protein Hair Cream nourishes the hair With its special formulated ingredients, it helps strengthen hair, and leave your hair soft and shiny.
Ingredients: 
Amla:
Amla, a natural hair tonic used extensively in Ayurveda, is an effective ingredient for management of the hair and scalp.
 
Chickpea:
Chickpea, a natural source of proteins, effectively nourishes hair, making it healthy and strong.

bengaliName: হিমালয়া পিউরিফাইং নিম ফেস প্যাক ১০০ মিলি
longDesc:
Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya Drugs Ltd.
Himalaya's Purifying Neem Pack brings together the goodness of Neem, Fuller's Earth, and Turmeric, which work together to remove excess oil, clean clogged pores, and helps prevent the recurrence of pimples.
        

Neem
Neem is an excellent skincare ingredient known for its antibacterial properties. It improves general skin health and combating bacterial infection like acne.
 
Turmeric
Turmeric has been used as an antiseptic for centuries and is regarded as one of nature's most powerful healers. The herb helps to even out your skin tone and color, making it an excellent ingredient in a face wash. Turmeric has strong anti-inflammatory properties, which help soothe your skin.
name: Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Pack 100 ml
nameWithoutSubText: Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Pack

bengaliName: হিমালয়া ক্লিয়ার কমপ্লেক্সন হোয়াইটেনিং ফেস ওয়াশ ১০০ মিলি
longDesc:
Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya Drugs Ltd.
Himalaya's Clear Complexion Brightening Face Wash cleanses and clarifies impurities, revealing a clear, radiant and even complexion.
Licorice
Licorice is known for its skin lightening and antioxidant properties. It improves skin tone and whitens skin.
 
Pomegranate
Pomegranate is a rich source of polyphenols and reported to possess potent antioxidant and protective benefits against free radicals. Pomegranate softens and nourishes the skin.
 
Saffron
Saffron is known to impart a rich color and is used in various skincare preparations. It is known to promote a healthy complexion and whiten skin.
name: Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash 100 ml
nameWithoutSubText: Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash

bengaliName: হিমালয়া ডিপ ক্লিনসিং এপ্রিকোট ফেস ওয়াশ ১০০ মিলি
longDesc:
Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya drugs Ltd.

Himalaya’s Deep Cleansing Apricot Face Wash gently removes dead skin cells and unclogs pores to reveal softer and smoother skin. Contains Aloe vera, Apricot and Neem.
Aloe Vera:
Aloe Vera, known for its many healing properties, helps your skin retain its natural moisture.
Apricot:
Apricot granules gently exfoliate dead skin cells, bringing out your skin's natural glow.

Neem:
Neem is an excellent skincare ingredient known for its antibacterial properties. It is known to improve general skin health and combating skin conditions like acne.
name: Himalaya Deep Cleansing Apricot Face Wash 100 ml
nameWithoutSubText: Himalaya Deep Cleansing Apricot Face Wash

bengaliName: Himalaya Fairness Kesar Face Wash 100 ml
longDesc:
Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya drugs Ltd.

Himalaya’s Natural Glow Kesar Face Wash is a soap-free, formulation that brightens and rejuvenates your skin, giving it a healthy, natural glow. Contains cucumber, pomegranate, mint and kesar.
Cucumber:
Cucumber makes an excellent toner as it is known to tighten pores. It is known for its antioxidant property that helps rejuvenate the skin and leave it feeling soft and smooth.
Mint:
Mint is an antiseptic and an excellent skin cleanser. It helps soothe the skin.
Pomegranate:
Pomegranate is a rich source of polyphenols. It is reported to possess potent antioxidant and protective benefits against free radicals generated by the environment. Pomegranate help softens and nourishes the skin.
Kesar:
Kesar is a luxurious herb that has been used in skincare for centuries for a fairer, brighter complexion.
name: Himalaya Fairness Kesar Face Wash 100 ml
nameWithoutSubText: Himalaya Fairness Kesar Face Wash

Indian Gooseberry

Reduces wrinkles, fine lines and skin roughness.

Aloe Vera:
Aloe Vera, known for its healing properties, is rich in polysaccharides, exhibits hydrating, softening, and moisturizing properties, which help keep the skin soft and supple.
Grape:
Grape is known to be rich in AHAs (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) and act on wrinkles and fine lines.

• Tea Tree Oil imported  from Australia. 
• This is a natural anti-bacterial agent that gives you a deep cleansing foaming facial wash.
• Beauty Formulas offers a deep cleansing exfoliating facial wash to effectively remove dirt, make-up and other impurities for a clearer fresher complexion with the benefit of hydroxy acids to gently exfoliate and keep skin clean and healthy.
•  Anyone can use it regularly to help tackle skin blemishes and excessive oil secretion without over-drying. 

Take a generous amount of exfoliating facial wash and gently massage all over face including neck area. Move your hands in upward circular motion and wash thoroughly after five minutes. Suitable for all skin types.
